definition[0]: to quickly attack or destroy something, especially using a beam of electricity
example[0]: Doctors have tried zapping tumors with high-voltage radiation.
example[1]: The laser weapons are designed to zap enemy missiles.
definition[1]: to change channels on a television by using a remote control
example[2]: Dave just sat there, zapping through all the channels.
definition[2]: to cook something in a microwave1(1)
definition[3]: to send information quickly from one computer to another
example[3]: Computers identify threats and zap the results back to US pilots in the war zone.
